slides.headerText: Say hi to your new finance tracker
slides.detailTextContains: You’re amazing for taking this first step towards getting better control over your money and financial goals.

slides.headerText: Control your spend and start saving
slides.detailTextContains: Monefy helps you control your spending, track your expenses, and ultimately save more money.

slides.headerText: Great! Want us to send you small reminders?
slides.detailTextContains: Users who have reminders activated are 2x more likely to stick to their budgets.

slides.headerText: Together we’ll reach your financial goals
slides.detailTextContains: If you fail to plan, you plan to fail. Monefy will help you stay focused on tracking your spend and reach your financial goals.

slides.tryFreeTextContains:
Try 7 days for free
Then €30.99 annually
slides.trialConversionText: Free trial converts to paid after 7 days, costing €30.99. Cancel anytime to avoid charges.
slides.policyText: Privacy Policy and Terms of Use
